name: General Knowledge Quiz
description:
At what level do you think your general knowledge is? 🤔 Here's a fun way to find out! DOWNLOAD GENERAL KNOWLEDGE QUIZ, ANSWER GK QUIZ QUESTIONS and discover how much you really know about the world that surrounds you. One of the cutest trivia games and general knowledge games awaits!

This GK quiz contains a bunch of trivia questions and answers from different categories and fun facts for every single quiz question you answer. Whether it's geography quiz, history trivia game or sports quiz questions that you prefer - this GK quiz trivia game includes all of them stack into one unique general knowledge game. One thing is for sure: you won't get bored answering those quick trivia questions. Some of us might find this general knowledge quiz easy, some hard, but we will all have a good time with this brain teaser. So, download General Knowledge Quiz trivia game and show the world that knowing random things can be fun and useful!

GENERAL KNOWLEDGE QUIZ FEATURES

- GK QUIZ IN 16 DIFFERENT LANGUAGES: Arabic, Bulgarian, Chinese, Croatian, English, French, German, Italian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Serbian, Spanish, Korean, Japanese and Thai
- HINTS - if you get stuck on a certain question, hint can be of help OR you can
- SKIP QUESTION, lose one life and move to the next trivia question
- HEARTS are your lives, each incorrect answer is one heart less
- ASK A FRIEND for help if you run out of all hints
- CERTIFICATE - you get it once you answer all trivia quiz questions

Fun quick quizzes in general are a nice way to have a good time and learn something new. With so many trivia questions and answers + fun facts for each one of them, this general knowledge quiz is a must-have among the apps. With a possibility to answer quick quiz questions in all the languages you know, this GK quiz is one of the most interesting general knowledge games than ever! So get General Knowledge Quiz game and enjoy learning new stuff through quick trivia questions and answers!
